translation.en: -[meowing] -♪ No matter what we wear ♪ ♪ We're gonna be right there ♪
-♪ Jump to it, jump to it ♪ -[Charm Alarms chirping]
♪ So let's suit up And save the day ♪
♪ Gowns and crowns are always fun, And when it's time to get things done ♪
-♪ Princesses wear pants! ♪ -♪ Yeah! ♪
-♪ Let's go! ♪ -♪ Glide or sail, or hop a plane ♪
translation.ko: 바지를 입고! 예! 가자! 하늘 바다 어디든지 온 세상을 바꿔봐

translation.en: ♪ We'll change the world The Princess way ♪
translation.ko: 하늘 바다 어디든지 온 세상을 바꿔봐

translation.en: -♪ Princesses wear pants! ♪ -♪ Yeah! ♪
♪ With the Fruitdoms in our hands ♪ ♪ These Princesses wear pants! ♪
translation.ko: 과일왕국을 위해 우린 할 수 있어

translation.en: [all] Princess Power!
Okay, Fussy, your "mani-purry" is done.
Did you say "purr-fect"? Glad we agree.
Penny darling, I was just downstairs checking in on, ah, ah!
translation.ko: 페니, 잠깐 아래층에서 뭐 하나 보려고…

translation.en: Uh, I was gonna clean that up.
Penny, I'm not asking for perfection, but yes... [chuckles]
translation.ko: 페니, 완벽을 바라는 건 아니지만, 그래

translation.en: please do clean that up, and...
that.
Take the mess and make it less. Consider it done.
Thank you.
And I've got just the thing.
My newest creation is ready!
Behold! The Super-Duper Clutter Picker-Upper!
This solution will make a bubble that can pick up any mess anywhere any time.
translation.ko: 언제 어디서든 지저분한 걸 가두는 비눗방울을 만들지

translation.en: It'll revolutionize cleaning all over the Fruitdom!
translation.ko: 과일왕국 전체의 청소에 혁명을 일으킬 거야

translation.en: It's unstoppable, it's unpoppable!
But not Fussy-proof.
I guess it's back to the drawing board.
[gasps] The Charm Alarm!
Kira needs us!
-[purrs] -Come on, Fussy!
♪ Let's go, let's go Na na na na na na ♪
♪ When the trouble in our world Feels too big for one alone ♪
translation.ko: 무슨 문제가 있니 혼자 힘들어할 때, 예!

translation.en: -♪ Yeah! ♪ -♪ Na na na na na na ♪
-♪ We jump right into action ♪ -♪ That's right! ♪
-♪ To help those in need ♪ -♪ Okay! ♪
♪ Every mistake we make ♪ -♪ Is just a step along the way ♪ -Whoo-hoo!
translation.ko: 실수를 하더라도 주눅 들 필요 없어

translation.en: ♪ So let's go, go, go, Come on let's take on the day ♪
translation.ko: 함께 가 보자 온종일 더 신나게

translation.en: -♪ Let's take on the day ♪ -♪ Yeah! ♪ ♪ We'll just try 'til we get it right! ♪
translation.ko: 매일 신나게, 예! 뭐든지 도전하는 거야

translation.en: ♪ And never give up the fight! ♪
♪ 'Cause that's the Princess way! ♪
Princesses, I need your help!
Mr. Scrumples ran up the fireplace.
He's too scared to come down and too high for me to reach him!
translation.ko: 너무 겁먹어서 못 내려오는데 내 팔도 안 닿아

translation.en: A trapped Teenykin?
That's a huge-ikin disaster! Of course we'll help!
translation.ko: 깜찍이가 갇혔다고? 정말 큰일 났네 당연히 도와야지

translation.en: We Pinkie Tea Promise to help those in need.
translation.ko: 필요하면 누구든 돕기 새끼손가락 걸고 약속

translation.en: [all] With our Princess Power, we'll always succeed!
To the Kiwi Fruitdom!
[Penny] Wow, that's a big fireplace.
We're supposed to find one little hamster inside?
translation.ko: 여기서 작은 햄스터 한 마리를 찾으라고?

translation.en: Challenge accepted.
Work with me, pal! I'm trying to get you unstuck!
translation.ko: 협조 좀 해라 갇힌 널 꺼내 주려는 거야

translation.en: Ugh, now I'm stuck too! Fireplace: one. Bea: zero.
translation.ko: 나도 갇혔어 벽난로 대 베아, 1 대 0

translation.en: A little help, Princesses?
Any chance you've got a rope in that kit?
Not yet.
translation.ko: 아직은 없지만, 순식간에 눈부신 밧줄을 만들 거야

translation.en: But I'll fashion up a be-dazzlous one before I can say...
translation.ko: 아직은 없지만, 순식간에 눈부신 밧줄을 만들 거야 이렇게, 짠!

translation.en: Ta-da!
Hold on, Bea!
Nice pull, Rita.
[pants] Thanks. My fashions are fantabulous and functional.
translation.ko: 고마워 내 패션은 아주 환상적이고 실용적이야

translation.en: I tried, but I think Mr. Scrumples only likes you.
translation.ko: 아무래도 스크럼플스는 너만 좋아하는 것 같아

translation.en: Bee stings!
If I were a bird, I'd soar up and carry him out!
But I can't.
But my unstoppable, unpoppable bubble can!
translation.ko: 하지만 내 터지지 않는 무적의 비눗방울이라면 가능해

translation.en: Your unpoppable, boppable w-w-what?
I can send a bubble up the chimney
translation.ko: 굴뚝에 비눗방울을 올려 보내면 스크럼플스를 태워서

translation.en: that'll pick up Mr. Scrumples and float him out the top!
translation.ko: 굴뚝에 비눗방울을 올려 보내면 스크럼플스를 태워서 위로 떠오르게 할 수 있어

translation.en: Then I can catch him when he comes out!
And I'll bring four extra paws so I can't miss. -Come on, Fussy. -[shrieks]
translation.ko: 놓치지 않게 발 4개를 더 데려갈래 가자, 퍼시

translation.en: This'll be my strongest bubble yet.
translation.ko: 이건 내 가장 강력한 비눗방울이 될 거야

translation.en: Heads up, Kira! It's comin'!
Let's go to the balcony and see if it works.
Fussy, do you see Mr. Scrumples? Is he close?
[gasps] Fussy!
Oh. The bubble got you. I'm so glad.
[gasps] And now it got me!
Princesses, look!
Well, on the plus side, your bubble worked.
Too well!
We gotta stop them before they float away!
translation.ko: 멀리 날아가 버리기 전에 멈춰야 해

translation.en: Or before Fussy pops that bubble!
To the Pineapple plane!
Everything looks so tiny from up here.
It's kinda soothing, don't you think?
Fussy, no! If you pop this bubble, we all fall.
translation.ko: 안 돼! 이 방울을 터뜨리면 우리 다 떨어져

translation.en: Make a beeline for that bubble!
Science snag. When we get close, the propeller blows it away!
translation.ko: 과학적인 문제야, 가까이 가면 프로펠러 바람에 날아가

translation.en: Oh, ruffles! It's spinning out of control toward the Pineapple Fruitdom!
translation.ko: 어떡해, 제멋대로 돌면서 파인애플 과일왕국으로 가고 있어

translation.en: Don't worry, Fussy. We're safe, I promise.
translation.ko: 걱정 마, 퍼시, 우린 안전해 약속할게

translation.en: This is an epic case of bubble trouble!
And it's not over! Now the bubble's headed right for that pelican!
translation.ko: 아직 안 끝났어, 이제 방울이 펠리컨을 향하고 있어

translation.en: Uh-oh. That pelican can burst our bubble with his beak.
translation.ko: 저 펠리컨이 우리 희망을 깰 수도 있겠어

translation.en: Think, think, think.
If I were a bird, what would shoo me away?
A coyote!
Wait!
You don't want to peck that bubble.
translation.ko: 뭐 하러 비눗방울을 쪼아? 더 좋은 걸 쫄 수 있는데

translation.en: You want to peck a tantalizing tuna fish tea sandwich.
translation.ko: 뭐 하러 비눗방울을 쪼아? 더 좋은 걸 쫄 수 있는데 군침 도는 간식용 참치샌드위치야

translation.en: Phew!
[sighs] That was too, too, too close.
And interesting.
The pelican's added weight made the bubble lower a little.
So if my calculations are correct, if we add more weight to the bubble,
translation.ko: 내 계산이 맞는다면 방울을 더 무겁게 만들면

translation.en: it'll get lower and lower until it lands!
translation.ko: 점점 더 내려가 결국 착륙할 거야

translation.en: Science success!
Okay! So how do we put things in the bubble if we can't get close to it?
translation.ko: 그렇군, 그런데 가까이 못 가는데 어떻게 무겁게 만들어?

translation.en: Oh, oh, oh! I know!
It's all in the wrist. And the kit.
I can fashion up a be-dazzlous slingshot!
Sweet! But where do we find stuff to sling?
Check around your feet!
[gasps] This thing is loaded with stuff! Here you go, Rita!
translation.ko: 뭐가 잔뜩 실려 있어 자, 여기, 리타

translation.en: True story: you gotta keep stuff around
translation.ko: 항상 바리바리 싸 들고 다녀야 해

translation.en: 'cause you'll never know when you'll have to Princess on the go.
Okay, for real, those boots look so good on you.
translation.ko: 와, 그 장화가 정말 잘 어울린다

translation.en: It's working! Oh, but I'm out of stuff to sling!
translation.ko: 효과가 있어 더는 쏘아 보낼 게 없어

translation.en: Me too! Everything else is bolted down.
Well, I'm not bolted down.
Penny, fly over the bubble. I'm going in!
translation.ko: 페니, 방울 위로 날아 내가 들어갈게

translation.en: What? That sounds like the worst idea since socks with sandals!
translation.ko: 뭐? 샌들에 양말 신기만큼 형편없는 생각이야

translation.en: Are you sure?
You got nothing to show for it if you don’t go for it.
translation.ko: 실제로 해보지 않으면 결과를 알 수 없어

translation.en: Get ready, Bea!
One, two, three.
Go!
Ugh! Am I late for tea?
-[Fussy meows] -Oops! Sorry, Fussy.
-[meows] -Teenykin-tastic timing!
Especially since we're so low in the sky. I think we might be landing.
translation.ko: 아주 낮게 날고 있으니 어쩌면 착륙할 것 같아

translation.en: Please return your seats to their full upright position.
translation.ko: 좌석의 등받이를 다시 똑바로 세워 주세요

translation.en: Gutter ball. I didn't get us low enough to land.
translation.ko: 큰일이야, 내 무게론 착륙할 만큼 안 내려가

translation.en: But Penny's bedroom is right there!
And if this bubble was a puzzle piece,
it would fit right inside Penny's bedroom window!
translation.ko: 페니의 방 창문에 딱 맞을 거야

translation.en: But we're not floating towards Penny's window.
We will be! Everybody, run with me!
translation.ko: 바꾸면 되지 모두 나랑 같이 뛰어!

translation.en: For real? They're exercising now?
No. They're controlling the bubble's direction!
It's bubble brilliant!
Brace yourself for impact!
Three, two, one!
[Bea] Ricochet bank shot for the win!
Goal!
Game, set, and match, Bea!
Now, we can burst that bubble and set you free!
translation.ko: 이제 비눗방울을 터뜨려서 너희를 꺼내 줄게

translation.en: Wait! If you touch the bubble, you'll get pulled inside too!
translation.ko: 잠깐! 방울을 만지면 너도 안으로 빨려 들어가

translation.en: But nothing's Fussy-proof.
It's your time to shine, Fussy!
Duck!
I think you meant "cat."
Huh. This is new.
I never know what kind of surprise I'll find in here.
translation.ko: 여긴 항상 새롭게 날 놀라게 하는구나

translation.en: At least it keeps things interesting.
Hey, pelican. Boots off the bed.
translation.ko: 펠리컨, 장화 신고 침대 밟지 마

translation.en: Need help cleaning up, Penny? I would love some help.
translation.ko: - 청소 좀 도와줄까, 페니? - 그러면 너무 좋지

translation.en: ♪ No matter what we wear We're gonna be right there ♪
-♪ Jump to it ♪ -♪ Jump to it ♪
♪ So let's suit up And save the day ♪
♪ Gowns and crowns are always fun, And when it's time to get things done ♪
-♪ Princesses wear pants! ♪ -♪ Yeah! ♪
-♪ Let's go! ♪ -♪ Glide or sail, or hop a plane ♪
translation.ko: 바지를 입고! 예! 가자! 하늘 바다 어디든지 온 세상을 바꿔봐

translation.en: ♪ We'll change the world The Princess way ♪
translation.ko: 하늘 바다 어디든지 온 세상을 바꿔봐

translation.en: -♪ Princesses wear pants! ♪ -♪ Yeah! ♪
♪ With the Fruitdoms in our hands ♪ ♪ These Princesses wear pants! ♪
translation.ko: 과일왕국을 위해 우린 할 수 있어
